lead_paragraph: Caroline Wozniacki kept up the best month of her career, moving into the final of the Pilot Pen tournament with a 7-5, 6-4 victory over seventh-seeded Alize Cornet. In the other semifinal, Anna Chakvetadze defeated Amélie Mauresmo, 6-3, 3-6, 6-1. In the men’s draw, the American Mardy Fish upset top-seeded Fernando Verdasco of Spain, 6-0, 1-6, 6-3, to advance to his second consecutive Pilot Pen final. He will face sixth-seeded Marin Cilic, who beat the qualifier Luka Gregorc, 6-3, 6-3.
